name: Yes, your 2019
description:
Hello there!

This little fangame depict the events that have been happening in the Yes, your grace meta in the past year. I hope you have good time playing it, and that you have a happy new year!

If you have no clue what yes your grace is and what youre even looking at, this is a fangame for this game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1115690/Yes_Your_Grace/
